data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Believe you can and you're half way there.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Quality is much better than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever.This approach has never let me down.

data.author: Sam Ewing
data.quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.

data.author: Bill Clinton
data.quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.

data.author: Bill Gates
data.quote: If you give people tools, and they use their natural abilities and their curiosity, they will develop things in ways that will surprise you very much beyond what you might have expected.

data.author: Bill Gates
data.quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.

data.author: Thomas Jefferson
data.quote: I'm a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.

data.author: Newt Gingrich
data.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.

data.author: Barack Obama
data.quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.

data.author: Barack Obama
data.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.

data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: The reason a lot of people do not recognize opportunity is because it usually goes around wearing overalls looking like hard work.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.

data.author: Margaret Thatcher
data.quote: I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but it should get you pretty near.

data.author: Booker T. Washington
data.quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.quote: When I was young, I observed that nine out of ten things I did were failures. So I did ten times more work.

data.author: Ann Landers
data.quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.

data.author: Jessica Savitch
data.quote: For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work.

data.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
data.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.

data.author: Larry Bird
data.quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100 percent all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.

data.author: Ralph Marston
data.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
